title: riskyduck24
author: riskyduck24
created_time: February 07, 2023, 03:33:17 AMLast edit: February 07, 2023, 08:00:42 AM by riskyduck24
content: Is teachlead piece. Basically is refering to  people who critize  him just to elevate themself like many of here. Many critics,  scam bastlers, righteous , critics etc many of them just do it to make themself feel better.  they are evil .  they act like ´´they do care´´.They are not good and better than you.their life just sucks and they try to find other people to critize and call them names to elevate  themself up. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pz9f4dU2F4g

comments.author: Foxpup
comments.body: Quote from: riskyduck24 on February 07, 2023, 03:33:17 AMI opened a thread of complaining about what   happened to me with one mod. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5438433.0What mod? There were no mods involved. Just ordinary users who caught on to your scheme. If you don't like the fact that this forum has users too smart to fall for your lies, go find one with more gullible users. Don't let the door hit you on the way out.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: If you're not okay here you got the freedom to leave, and you'll not be missed since you have made no contribution to the forum.Also, I believe ppl are right; you provided a loan to your own alt since both of your account's writing style looks so much similar. Even an untrained kid can catch you here. Why not put your skills and money into something good ?

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on February 07, 2023, 03:58:03 AMIf you're not okay here you got the freedom to leave, and you'll not be missed since you have made no contribution to the forum.Also, I believe ppl are right; you provided a loan to your own alt since both of your account's writing style looks so much similar. Even an untrained kid can catch you here. Why not put your skills and money into something good ?Without rules, there will be anarchy. If we want to get the best out of his forum it must be controlled by written or unwritten rules. We are even privileged to have good members that volunteer to enforce these laws, thereby keeping the forum clean. I read in the beginners and help section that you must have thick skin to excel in this forum. Just be patient and adjust to the rules, and you might end up becoming one of the renowned members of the forum. This forum is voluntary which means you can stop visiting if you are uncomfortable with the rules.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Foxpup on February 07, 2023, 03:43:29 AMQuote from: riskyduck24 on February 07, 2023, 03:33:17 AMI opened a thread of complaining about what   happened to me with one mod. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5438433.0What mod? There were no mods involved. Just ordinary users who caught on to your scheme. If you don't like the fact that this forum has users too smart to fall for your lies, go find one with more gullible users. Don't let the door hit you on the way out.maybe it can be considered that the moderator is included in his circus. namely, his alt account goku88 has been banned (we assume some mod did it). forum rules say that it is not allowed to have alt accounts in case of a ban, therefore, here we need one more reaction from the moderator to ban this riskyduck24 account as well.in the end, he himself admitted:Quote from: riskyduck24 on February 07, 2023, 06:40:23 AMi troll ya all i lied.   but not to scam someone like i have been accused. I did it for my own entertainment.
